title: [SD] Implement JUMAI Changes
description:
Business Scope:
Customer can have changes (i.e. additional Access Points) within an existing contract. These changes can be done with an existing network is in operation.

These changes may have an impact on the commercial value of the contract and therefore can make it necessary to negotiate it once again with the client.

Only technical changes like adding, change or a delete a VLAN, SSID etc. without any impact on costs or personnel effort can be deployed without further negotiations.
acceptance_criteria: a) Same configuration as an existing site
b) Different configuration (LAN/WiFi parameters, LAN / Wifi Hardware)
a) Same configuration and same country
b) Same configuration, but different country

components.title: Process Team Process team (3SM and O2F)
